item.title: Laptop Throttling
item.author: ryan@trolocsis.com (Ryan Phillips)
item.description: I installed Fedora 28 and Archlinux onto my development machine; a Lenovo Thinkpad t470s. Generally both distributions ran perfectly fine, but I did run into a problem on battery power.

item.title: Drafts : Search Google in Google Chrome
item.author: ryan@trolocsis.com (Ryan Phillips)
item.description: Drafts is a sweet productivity app for iOS. This action opens Chrome with a search term and provides a back button back to Drafts.

item.title: About
item.author: ryan@trolocsis.com (Ryan Phillips)
item.description: Software Engineer. Open Source Developer. Dad.
